ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Spare NP-FW50 Battery + <5> Battery Charger + <6> 55mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter +
<7> Shutter Remote Control + <8> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <9> PD 50" Compact Travel Tripod + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<11> HDMI to Micro-HDMI Cable (6') + <12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
